wikipedia_page.main: Esme Hubbard (1880 – 12 April 1951) was a British actress of the silent era.She was born Esme Woodbine Hubbard to British parents in Russia and died in Ealing, London in 1951 at age 71.

response: Caste was adapted for a 1915 British film directed by Laurence Trimble. Sir John Hare made his first appearance in motion pictures, reprising his acclaimed stage portrayal of Eccles. Other cast included Esme Hubbard (Polly Eccles), Campbell Gullan (Sam Gerridge), Peggy Hyland (Esther), Dawson Millward (Captain Hawtree), Roland Pertwee (George d'Alroy) and Mary Rorke (The Marquise) It is believed to be a lost film.
